DsarPolicyLog.name: DsarPolicyLog
DsarPolicyLog.description: Represents the history of Data Subject Access Request (DSAR) policy execution requests. This log records the status and results of executed DSAR policies for a customer. This object is available in API version 50.0 and later.

CompletionDateTime.description: The date and time when the data subject access request was completed. Available in API version 51.0 and later.

DataSubjectId.description: The 15–18 character ID of the data subject making the request. Available in API version 51.0 and later.

DeletedDateTime.description: The date and time when the file generated for the data subject’s request is deleted. Available in API version 51.0 and later.

DownloadedDateTime.description: The most recent date and time when the data subject downloaded the file generated at their request. Available in API version 51.0 and later.

DsarError.description: Represents an error in generating the file for the data subject access request. Available in API version 51.0 and later.

DsarPolicyId.description: The ID of the DSAR policy.

FileURL.description: The result of the DSAR policy execution. The URL links to a downloadable file that contains the customer data.

RequestDateTime.description: The date and time when a data subject requested access to their data in the org. Available in API version 51.0 and later.

RequestStatus.description: The status of the policy execution.

RequestUserId.description: The ID of the org employee or admin making the request on behalf of the data subject. Available in API version 51.0 and later.
